summary: This is an email from September 2, 2021, with the subject referencing a voicemail from June 28, 2019. The email forwards an audio attachment of a voicemail where a person named Stan recounts a possible mediation involving Jeffrey Epstein and Scott Link.

keyFacts: A voicemail from June 28, 2019, recounts a possible mediation involving Jeffrey Epstein and Scott Link.
The voicemail was forwarded via email on September 2, 2021, with the audio file attached.
The document suggests ongoing discussions or legal matters involving Epstein were being communicated about in mid-2019, shortly before his death.
